We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private Beta _b;
// In Initialize()
_b = B(target, reference, period);

// In OnData()
if (_b.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "B Warm Up Period", _b.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "B Is Ready", _b.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "B Current", _b.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "B Name", _b.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "B Samples", _b.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.b = self.B(target, reference, period)

# In OnData()
if self.b.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "B Warm Up Period", self.b.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "B Is Ready", self.b.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "B Current", self.b.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "B Name", self.b.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "B Samples", self.b.Samples);
}
